featured.text: The King agreed and gave Nehemiah a letter “to the governors of the province beyond the river,” requesting safe passage for him as he travelled through their lands.
The Hebrew Bible states that Nehemiah, an official serving King Artaxerxes of ancient Persia, asked permission to travel to Judah.

definition.zh_def: 尼希米，聖經中的一位人物，負責重建耶路撒冷的城牆。
definition.en_def: Nehemiah, a biblical figure known for rebuilding the walls of Jerusalem.
definition.example: Nehemiah led the effort to restore the city after the Babylonian exile.
